name: @castintech/castfash
description: CastFash - AI-powered fashion catalog visual generation platform by CastinTech
author: CastinTech <info@castintech.com>

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && cd backend && npm version patch && cd ../frontend && npm version patch
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && cd backend && npm version minor && cd ../frontend && npm version minor
scripts.version:major: npm version major && cd backend && npm version major && cd ../frontend && npm version major
